Package zebra4j.fact

Class CommutativeFact

java.lang.Object
zebra4j.fact.CommutativeFact
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fact
Direct Known Subclasses:
BothTrue, Different, NearbyHouse
@Immutable public abstract class CommutativeFact extends Object implements Fact
A fact about a commutative relationship between people identified by two attributes, called "left" and "right"

If the implementing fact has more fields than the two attributes, the methods need to be overridden.
